short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that replaces all vowels on the site to the letter "i" - to the fake language called "jizik kitku".

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Trinslitir kitku" is an extension that replaces all the vowels on the various sites to a letter "i".  Social group "Kitku ni dziwii" developed and use this language everyday for fun (and, as they say, to communicate with their cats).

A good example of use is on wikipedia: https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ragdoll
To start just click the icon on your chrome toolbar.

Social group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/KitkuNiDrziwii/
More about kitki language: https://kitkipidia.fandom.com/pl/wiki/Jinzik_kitkiwi
